features.item: Well cared for one non-smoker owner.

house_listing.comments:
Immaculate mobile home! Very light and cheery inside. Wallpapered/no paneled walls. New vinyl window in front and hallway. Nice Berber carpet throughout. Kitchen & dining also carpeted. Nice appliances included. Seller is the original owner and home shows pride of ownership.
Yard is well maintained and a small garden shed is to the rear of the home.

for_more_information_contact.firm_name: Windermere Real Estate/All Star Realty, L.L.C.
